channel.title: Grey Neurons Blog - Experience the wisdom

description.p: Grey Neurons is your trusted technology partner. We have 50+ years of building software. We strongly believe in designing simple, secured and scalable systems steering our customers clear of fad-technologies. We have helped start ups build their products from scratch and on other spectrum helped enterprises scale up their products. Grey Neurons has diverse experience in Travel and Transportation, Logistics, Fintech, Cards and Payments, Cyber security, Unified communication and Contact centers.
Java records - the new gamechanging feature in Java 14
Key takeaways from Tribe of Hackers book
